title: Demoted from bronze IV to bronze V after going 7-3 :/

replies.body: Pretty sure general play style and skill are accounted also, how ever i went from B2 to B4 going 4-6 in  y promos, and have friends that were in gold drop into B1, so something is wrong with the ranking system i think lol.
Yeah this. I had a solid win streak then all a sudden B1. Now i've lost nearly every ranked game since due to undesirable players.. not saying all B1 are bad at all! But i just got shit luck i guess.

> [{quoted}](name=Volcanuz,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=yuHfA2db,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-01-27T20:53:25.961+0000)
>
> Yeah this. I had a solid win streak then all a sudden B1. Now i've lost nearly every ranked game since due to undesirable players.. not saying all B1 are bad at all! But i just got shit luck i guess.


With the changes to how champ select works in ranked in this season I believe it should in theory be one of the easiest seasons to climb. I say in theory because you only need to know 2 roles if you so choose and play your best 2. It's  not working for me yet haha but I know it will
There are still plenty of potatoes choosing lanes they THINK they can play.

Should be yeah i agree. But i've just been put with some of the most dense players i've ever met. I'm no pro at all but most these games im on top of the board and that just shouldn't happen. Also i've seen crazy good lanes like mid ahri losing to champs they shouldn't ever lose too.

> [{quoted}](name=Volcanuz,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=yuHfA2db,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2016-01-27T21:51:56.699+0000)
>
> Should be yeah i agree. But i've just been put with some of the most dense players i've ever met. I'm no pro at all but most these games im on top of the board and that just shouldn't happen. Also i've seen crazy good lanes like mid ahri losing to champs they shouldn't ever lose too.

Yea I've had games recently where I wonder what's going on, but it's just part and parcel of it there will be games where you feel like you dominate but just don't transfer it across the map into victory. Ultimately i have myself to blame as during my placements I set myself up by playing poorly in first couple I died 22 times in first 3 placement games which was rubbish of me, and I ruined it for myself and the other 12 people who were in those games with me. 

Can't win every single game but can focus on what you did every game and hope to improve from that. That's what I keep telling myself anyway ha
The system is designed to place you below where you used to be. If you belong there then you'll get back.
Everybody was told to be expected to drop. I went 7-3 plat 2 to plat 5
Bro this happened to me as well, just gotta work on our game i went 5 - 5, just work on our game :) we will eventually get outta bronze
